title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: VR Immersive Escape Game for Marine Sustainable Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary marine ecosystem concepts and understanding of sustainability principles
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe components and interactions of marine ecosystems in a VR environment
Learners can propose at least three sustainable marine resource management strategies through in-game problem-solving
Learners design and present marine pollution reduction solutions through PBL team activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
